quizzes.title: Kotlin Multiplatform Basics
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of Kotlin Multiplatform fundamentals

questions.questionText: What is Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP)?
options: A technology that enables code sharing between platforms
questions.explanation: Kotlin Multiplatform is a technology that enables code sharing between platforms while keeping native benefits.

questions.questionText: Which platforms does Kotlin Multiplatform support?
options: Android, iOS, web, desktop, and more
questions.explanation: Kotlin Multiplatform supports multiple platforms including Android, iOS, web, desktop, and more.

questions.questionText: What is a common module in KMP?
options: A module that runs only on Android
A module that contains platform-specific code
A module that contains shared code for all platforms
A module that runs only on iOS
questions.explanation: A common module contains code that is shared across all platforms in a Kotlin Multiplatform project.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of expect/actual keywords in KMP?
questions.explanation: expect/actual keywords are used to declare platform-specific implementations in Kotlin Multiplatform.

questions.questionText: Which build system is commonly used with KMP?
questions.explanation: Gradle is the recommended build system for Kotlin Multiplatform projects.

questions.questionText: What is a Platform Module in KMP?
questions.explanation: A Platform Module contains code that is specific to a particular platform (e.g., Android, iOS, JVM).

questions.questionText: What is Kotlin/Native in KMP?
options: A technology for compiling Kotlin to native code
questions.explanation: Kotlin/Native is a technology that compiles Kotlin code to native binaries for various platforms.

questions.questionText: What is a Multiplatform Library in KMP?
options: A library that works on multiple platforms
questions.explanation: A Multiplatform Library is a library that can be used across different platforms in a Kotlin Multiplatform project.

questions.questionText: What is the Gradle Multiplatform Plugin?
options: A plugin for building multiplatform projects
questions.explanation: The Gradle Multiplatform Plugin provides support for building Kotlin Multiplatform projects using Gradle.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of source sets in KMP?
questions.explanation: Source sets in KMP help organize platform-specific code and define dependencies between different parts of the project.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlin-multiplatform plugin?
questions.explanation: The kotlin-multiplatform plugin enables multiplatform project support in Gradle, allowing you to build for multiple platforms.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx.serialization library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx.serialization is a multiplatform library for serializing and deserializing data in various formats like JSON.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx.coroutines library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx.coroutines is a multiplatform library for handling asynchronous programming in a structured way.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-datetime library in KMP?
options: To handle date and time operations
questions.explanation: kotlinx-datetime is a multiplatform library for handling date and time operations consistently across platforms.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-io library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-io is a multiplatform library for handling I/O operations in a platform-agnostic way.

quizzes.title: Kotlin Multiplatform Intermediate
quizzes.description: Intermediate concepts in Kotlin Multiplatform development

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Kotlin/JS in KMP?
options: To compile Kotlin code to JavaScript
questions.explanation: Kotlin/JS is a technology that compiles Kotlin code to JavaScript for web platforms.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Kotlin Serialization in KMP?
questions.explanation: Kotlin Serialization is a multiplatform library for serializing and deserializing data in various formats.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Ktor in KMP?
options: To handle HTTP requests and responses
questions.explanation: Ktor is a multiplatform framework for building asynchronous servers and clients.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of SQLDelight in KMP?
questions.explanation: SQLDelight is a multiplatform library for generating type-safe Kotlin APIs from SQL statements.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM)?
options: To share code between Android and iOS
questions.explanation: KMM is a technology that enables sharing code between Android and iOS applications.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-atomicfu library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-atomicfu provides multiplatform atomic operations for concurrent programming.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-html library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-html is a multiplatform library for generating HTML using Kotlin code.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-testing library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-testing provides tools for writing and running tests across different platforms.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-collections-immutable library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-collections-immutable provides immutable collection implementations for Kotlin Multiplatform.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-benchmark library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-benchmark is a multiplatform library for measuring code performance across different platforms.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-cli library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-cli is a multiplatform library for parsing command-line arguments in Kotlin applications.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-io-core library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-io-core provides core I/O operations for Kotlin Multiplatform applications.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-serialization-core library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-serialization-core provides core serialization functionality for Kotlin Multiplatform.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-coroutines-core library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-coroutines-core provides core coroutines functionality for asynchronous programming in KMP.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-datetime-core library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-datetime-core provides core date and time functionality for Kotlin Multiplatform.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-atomicfu-core library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-atomicfu-core provides core atomic operations for concurrent programming in KMP.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-html-core library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-html-core provides core HTML generation functionality for Kotlin Multiplatform.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-testing-core library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-testing-core provides core testing functionality for Kotlin Multiplatform applications.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-collections-immutable-core library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-collections-immutable-core provides core immutable collection implementations for KMP.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the kotlinx-benchmark-core library in KMP?
questions.explanation: kotlinx-benchmark-core provides core benchmarking functionality for Kotlin Multiplatform.

quizzes.title: Kotlin Multiplatform Advanced
quizzes.description: Advanced concepts in Kotlin Multiplatform development

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) plugin?
questions.explanation: The KMM plugin simplifies the setup and management of Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) IDE plugin?
options: To provide IDE support for KMM development
questions.explanation: The KMM IDE plugin provides enhanced IDE support for Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile development.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Gradle plugin?
questions.explanation: The KMM Gradle plugin manages the build process for Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) CocoaPods plugin?
questions.explanation: The KMM CocoaPods plugin helps integrate Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects with CocoaPods.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Xcode plugin?
questions.explanation: The KMM Xcode plugin helps integrate Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects with Xcode.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Android Studio plugin?
questions.explanation: The KMM Android Studio plugin helps integrate Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects with Android Studio.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) IntelliJ IDEA plugin?
questions.explanation: The KMM IntelliJ IDEA plugin helps integrate Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects with IntelliJ IDEA.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Visual Studio Code plugin?
options: To integrate with Visual Studio Code
questions.explanation: The KMM Visual Studio Code plugin helps integrate Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects with Visual Studio Code.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) CLI tool?
options: To manage KMM projects from command line
questions.explanation: The KMM CLI tool helps manage Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects from the command line.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Debugger?
questions.explanation: The KMM Debugger helps debug Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile applications across platforms.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Profiler?
questions.explanation: The KMM Profiler helps profile Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile applications for performance analysis.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Memory Leak Detector?
options: To detect memory leaks in KMM applications
questions.explanation: The KMM Memory Leak Detector helps identify and fix memory leaks in Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile applications.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Test Runner?
options: To run tests for KMM applications
questions.explanation: The KMM Test Runner helps run tests for Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile applications across platforms.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Coverage Tool?
options: To measure test coverage in KMM applications
questions.explanation: The KMM Coverage Tool helps measure test coverage in Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile applications.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Documentation Generator?
options: To generate documentation for KMM projects
questions.explanation: The KMM Documentation Generator helps create documentation for Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Dependency Analyzer?
options: To analyze dependencies in KMM projects
questions.explanation: The KMM Dependency Analyzer helps analyze and manage dependencies in Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Security Scanner?
options: To scan for security issues in KMM projects
questions.explanation: The KMM Security Scanner helps identify and fix security issues in Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Performance Analyzer?
options: To analyze performance in KMM applications
questions.explanation: The KMM Performance Analyzer helps analyze and optimize performance in Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile applications.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Code Generator?
questions.explanation: The KMM Code Generator helps generate platform-specific code for Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Resource Manager?
questions.explanation: The KMM Resource Manager helps manage and share resources across different platforms in KMM projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Localization Tool?
options: To manage localization in KMM projects
questions.explanation: The KMM Localization Tool helps manage and implement localization in Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Asset Manager?
questions.explanation: The KMM Asset Manager helps manage and share assets across different platforms in KMM projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Configuration Manager?
questions.explanation: The KMM Configuration Manager helps manage different configurations for Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Build System?
questions.explanation: The KMM Build System helps manage the build process for Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile projects.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) Deployment Tool?
questions.explanation: The KMM Deployment Tool helps manage the deployment process for Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile applications.
